past: You: Two small dots, one dark gray to the right and above a lighter dot of the same size?

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_pair = all_close([x, y], ctx)
        check_same_size = same_size([x, y], ctx)
        check_x_dark_grey = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_light_grey = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_right = are_right([x], [y], ctx)
        check_y_above = are_above([x], [y], ctx)
        if (
            check_pair
            and check_same_size
            and check_x_dark_grey
            and check_y_light_grey
            and check_y_right
            and check_y_above
        ):
            results.append([x, y])
    return results
